title: My snowdown shop is empty
body:
So I go to my snowdown shop and it is empty.

here is what my shop looks like.

http://puu.sh/lZToT/5aa3004587.jpg

replies.body: You've been naughty this year, no presents for you.

> [{quoted}](name=Telecasterdude,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=jxnIjUeg,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-12-18T09:40:19.529+0000)
>
> You've been naughty this year, no presents for you.

dammit you beat me.
my snowdown shop has only one skin :( and at a crappy discount, too
Have you already bought all of the skins? If you haven't, try logging in and logging back in again. If all else fails, send a report to Riot.
Good, that would be more thrilling than 5 recolours.
Restarting the client doesn't do anything.
log out an log back in an see if that works
